meaningMnemonic: There's an <radical>arrow</radical> in a <radical>turkey</radical> that you can <radical>see</radical> in your <kanji>view</kanji>. The turkey seems to be viewing you too, from afar.
readingMnemonic: As you <kanji>view</kanji> the turkey, Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん) suddenly comes into your view too. He towers over the injured turkey, leans down, and... pulls the arrow out!?
